scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development postcss src/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css && live-server ./public
scripts.serve-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development postcss src/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css && live-server ./public
scripts.serve-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production postcss src/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css && live-server ./public
